forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 67. West wind around 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 7 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the day begins with a vibrant clarity that hints at the promise of a warm afternoon. A gentle but persistent wind carries the scent of the bay, invigorating the air as it sweeps across the cityscape. Expect the temperature to rise to a comfortable 67, a perfect balance between the warmth of the sun and the coolness of the breeze. As evening approaches, the skies will remain mostly clear, offering a serene backdrop of stars twinkling against the deepening blue, with temperatures easing down to a mild 57.

Presently, the marine layer seems to have drifted away, leaving the Golden Gate Bridge and the surrounding vistas in breathtaking view. There’s a hush in the air, an invitation to explore the neighborhood streets, perhaps to stroll along the Embarcadero or savor a cup of coffee in one of the quaint cafés. Dressing in layers is wise; a light jacket may serve you well as the evening unfolds. Embrace the day with a spirit of discovery, relishing the simple, beautiful moments that only a day like today can offer.
